page.title: 18A Parish Council, Eccleshill
page.content: In 1984-5 the P.C. diary contained the following: assessment of{lighting}needs at Victoria Buildings, organization of a {gardening comp.}and its{prize-giving at a Potato Pie Supper, maintenance of Eccleshill{playing field, policing}in the area, broken{asbestos}at Shaws, {pavements, verges}and{hedges, road {signs,}loss of a{lengthsman, Transport {Bill,}illicit{parking}of lorries; discussion with the{Borough Engineer on lack of{footpaths, flooding}on Johnson New Road,{unadopted road }at Victoria Buildings,{speed restriction Roman Road Pothouse; commenting on {planning applications}for Wolstenholme Bronze Powders, boring at Waterside and conversion of an old Co-op;{O.A.Ps {parcels}at Xmas,{audit}of accounts and {precept}for 1985-6 - and much more! Brian Cowen, Clerk.
